publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3045 Bristow Muldoon: Livingston Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Livingston Football Club on its qualification for European competition in its first year in the Scottish Premier League; further congratulates the directors, management, players, staff and all concerned with the club for their efforts in achieving this success; and wishes Livingston Football Club every success in the UEFA Cup next season.
S1M-3045 Livingston Football Club (lodged on 29 April 2002) Bill Butler*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-3045 Livingston Football Club (lodged on 29 April 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*, Pauline McNeill*, Des McNulty*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Trish Godman*, Mr John McAllion*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Gillon*, Tommy Sheridan*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-3045 Livingston Football Club (lodged on 29 April 2002) Janis Hughes*, Donald Gorrie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S1M-3045 Bristow Muldoon: Livingston Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Livingston Football Club on its qualification for European competition in its first year in the Scottish Premier League; further congratulates the directors, management, players, staff and all concerned with the club for their efforts in achieving this success; and wishes Livingston Football Club every success in the UEFA Cup next season. Supported by: Bill Butler, Mr Jamie Stone, Fiona Hyslop, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Pauline McNeill, Des McNulty, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Michael McMahon, Trish Godman, Mr John McAllion, Mr Frank McAveety, Karen Gillon, Tommy Sheridan, Helen Eadie, Janis Hughes, Donald Gorrie, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3045 Livingston Football Club (lodged on 29 April 2002) Cathy Peattie*
